section.title: Java Development Kit (JDK)
section.para: You must have one of the following JDKs installed in order to build the project:
Remember to ensure that "javac" and "java" are in your path (or symlinked).
section.programlisting:
JAVA_HOME=/location/to/javahome export JAVA_HOME
PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH export PATH

section.title: Apache Ant
section.para: You must have Apache Ant 1.7.1+ installed on your system.
Remember to ensure that "ant" are in your path (or symlinked).
section.programlisting:
ANT_HOME=/location/to/anthome export ANT_HOME
PATH=$ANT_HOME/bin:$PATH export PATH

section.title: Apache Ivy
section.para: You must have Apache Ivy 2.0.0+ installed in your Apache Ant installation.

section.title: Subversion
section.para: You must have Subversion 1.5+ installed on your system.
Remember to ensure that "svn" are in your path (or symlinked).
